definitions.definition: A book or an encyclopedia of recipes and cookery tips .
examples: They inherited an interesting nineteenth-century cookbook from their grandparents. It tells how to render lard.

definitions.definition: Any book or set of strategies and tips .
examples: Reading business biographies is interesting, but they are not cookbooks that can teach hacks how to be greats.

main_definition: A book or an encyclopedia of recipes and cookery tips .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , figurative ) Any book or set of strategies and tips .
